description: Entertain with ease with this impressive cheese platter that heroes award-winning cheeses, from brie to vintage cheddar. It's the ultimate grazing board.
name: The Award-Winning Cheese Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 170 g Thomas Dux hommus with roasted garlic & truffle oil dip
200 g Thomas Dux English vintage cheddar
200 g Thomas Dux red Leicester cheese
130 g Woolworths artisan style rosemary & sea salt crispbread

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange red Leicester, fetta, Stilton, peach, cherries, basil, rosemary and chutney on a large serving board. Serve with grissini, crispbread, apple and grapes.
Arrange red Leicester, fetta, Stilton, peach, cherries, basil, rosemary and chutney on a large serving board. Serve with grissini, crispbread, apple and grapes.
